Posts.Content: Tayhante wrote: Hello! I'm looking to connect with TCHP survivors. I had my first treatment May 7th and struggling. Can you please share your side effects. I have been struggling with shortness of breath n bone pain. Has anyone out there had similar SE? Did you experience any heart or lung problems? Thanks! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone currently on TCHP? Tayhante Tayhante

Posts.Content: May 16, 2015 11:01AM Tayhante wrote: Hi Meadow, So nice to meet you. I have been struggling with so many nasty side effects. I joined this site to connect with "real" ladies to learn more about their experience. I had my first infusion March 7 and the SE have been non stop. My oncologist thinks it will get better next week. Yes the breathing issues were frightening. For 4 days i couldn't sleep n my breath was so shallow on the right side. From Monday-now I have had diarrhea. Imodium n pepto bismol doesn't work. Sharp pains come n go. I am integrating accupture into my care. I know my body is overwelmed by all these drugs. Did you have diarrhea? How many days did your diarrhea last? How did you manage it? Thank you again for reaching out to me. I look forward to keeping in contact with you. Have a wonderful day. Teal
Posts.Title: Anyone currently on TCHP? Tayhante Tayhante

Posts.Content: May 16, 2015 11:02AM Tayhante wrote: Will do. Thanks for sharing!
